Function Documentation

void CSL_armR5CacheEnableHardErrCache ( uint32_t  enable)

Enable/disable hard error cache.

Requirement: REQ_TAG(PRSDK-1673) Design: did_csl_core_hard_err_cache_access

This function is used to enable or disable hard error caches.

Parameters
enable[IN] 0=Hard error caches are disabled, otherwise they are enabled
Returns
None
